item.title: Xbox - Project Scorpio
item.description:
Xbox - Project Scorpio

The most powerful console ever. Holiday 2017.

item.title: Xbox One S
item.description:
Xbox One S

Introducing the new Xbox One S. Play the greatest games lineup, including Xbox 360 classics, on a 40% smaller console. Experience richer, more luminous colors in games and video with High Dynamic Range technology. Stream 4K video on Netflix and Amazon Video, and watch UHD Blu-rayâ„¢ movies in stunning 4K Ultra HD.

item.title: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands Trailer: Cartel Cinematic - E3 2016
item.description:
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands Trailer: Cartel Cinematic - E3 2016

The Santa Blanca Cartel controls the Wildlands and its people, and the Ghosts are on a mission to disrupt the organization's grip on Bolivia. Ghost Recon Wildlands releases March 7, 2017.

item.title: This Week's Deals With Gold And Spotlight Sale
item.description:
This Week's Deals With Gold And Spotlight Sale

Here are this week's games and add-on deals on the Xbox Games Store. Discounts are valid now through 27 June 2016.

item.title: Star Wars Battlefront - Bespin Gameplay Trailer
item.description:
Star Wars Battlefront - Bespin Gameplay Trailer

Experience new heroes, maps, mode, weapons, star cards and more in the new Bespin digital expansion. Join Lando Calrissian and Dengar in the Cloud City of Bespin. Take flight in a cloud car, journey through Cloud City, navigate carbon-freezing chambers, or hunt enemies with the X-8 Night Sniper and EE-4 blasters.

item.title: Minecraft E3 2016: Add-ons
item.description:
Minecraft E3 2016: Add-ons

Minecraft Live at E3 2016! We're excited to give you a sneak peak at Add-ons for Pocket Edition and Windows 10 Edition: Beta coming this fall. These will allow players to transform the look of their world and even change the behavior of mobs!

item.title: Play First, Play More, Pay Less. All with EA Access.
item.description:
Play First, Play More, Pay Less. All with EA Access.

Play Battlefield 1 and Mass Effect Andromeda first with EA Access. Or tap into your favorite EA games like FIFA 16, Dragon Age Inquisition, and more with the EA Access Vault: http://x.ea.com/6464

item.title: Phil Spencer discusses the new Xbox One S
item.description:
Phil Spencer discusses the new Xbox One S

The Xbox One S was announced at our Xbox At E3 2016 briefing and I had the opportunity to sit down with Phil Spencer and chat about it.

item.description:
Xbox E3 2016 Briefing Highlights

The newest games and features coming to Xbox One and Windows 10.

item.title: Xbox E3 2016 Characters that Matter
item.description:
Xbox E3 2016 Characters that Matter

With the richest stories and most compelling characters, this is the biggest year for Xbox games. Jump ahead.
